request.description:
Should respond with 200 OK and a similar JSON:

{
    "id": 31,
    "clientId": "1111",
    "type": "NAVIGATION",
    "target": "button",
    "createdAt": "2012-08-12T22:20:58.611"
  }
Should respond with 200 ok and all activities in JSON format as body.

item.name: Add new clientactivity large text in target
